name: vulvar melanoma
definition: A vulva cancer that has_material_basis in melanocytes. [url:https\://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5514586/]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a clinical case study, Gleevec (imatinib) treatment resulted in partial response in a patient with recurrent vulval melanoma harboring KIT K642E, with reduction of tumor mass by 35% at 12 weeks (PMID: 20372153).

references.title: Clinical responses observed with imatinib or sorafenib in melanoma patients expressing mutations in KIT.
